name: Episode Clicker
description:
Episode Clicker

My first game! Which I've made a Youtube-video about:

This is a clicker game about watching as many episodes as possible. You could try to reach 1000 episodes with 1000 clicks (and get carpal tunnel), but there are some features to help you:

  • "PowerClick" doubles your watching power!
  • "1st Powerup" Watches over you even when you're AFK!
  • *Background dramatically turns red* triples your clicks. There is no better time to vigorously flip-kick-trick the thick sick click-button!
  • "Click for rewards!" Does just what it promises, so keep your eyes peeled during all episodes!
